outlineCentreOfMass

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate outlineCentreOfMass(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry g)
Returns the centre-of-mass of g's line segments
Parameters:
g - the Geometry to analyze
Returns:
the weighted average of the midpoints of g's line segments, weighted by segment length

toScoreFromSymDiffArea

public static double toScoreFromSymDiffArea(double targetArea,
                                            double candidateArea,
                                            double symDiffArea)
Returns a FeatureMatcher score based on the symmetric difference
Parameters:
targetArea - area of the target shape
candidateArea - area of the candidate shape
symDiffArea - area of the symmetric difference between the two shapes
Returns:
a linear function of the symmetric difference: 1 if the shapes perfectly overlap; 0 if the shapes do not overlap at all
